name: From Ashes (Toby Welsh)
description:
Description:

Your home has is going to be hit with a massive firestorm and your house is going to burn. You can't escape on your own. Luckily, you manage to call for help and a chopper will come to get you. You have two minutes before the chopper arrives. The pilot tells you that you should be able to take a few things with you.

With nothing else to do until the chopper arrives what possessions do you choose to take?

Has Keyboard + Mouse Support and X-Box Controller Support

-----------------------------

Credits:

Game Designers: Andrew A.W, Toby Paul Rowan Welsh.

UI Programming: Andrew A.W.

Physics and In-Game Programming: Toby Welsh.

Object Modeller: Simon Davis

Texturing: Andrew A.W. Simon Davis.

Audio: Soundbible.com.

Engine: Unity


Andrew's Itch.Io: https://amateurbb.itch.io/
